thread.title_full: Latam Airlines Group S.A. Call to tender sao paulo - Guarulhos airport in accordance to the slots’ exchange procedureTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Latam Airlines Group S.A. Call to tender sao paulo - Guarulhos airport in accordance to the slots’ exchange procedureTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Latam Airlines Group S.A. Call to tender sao paulo – Guarulhos airport in accordance to the slots’ exchange procedure Published on : Friday, September 4, 2015
In compliance to the ruling of the Tribunal de Defensa de la Libre Competencia (Competition Court of Chile), and to the provisions contained in the document “LATAM Slots’ Exchange Procedure According to the First Condition Resolution No. 37/2011 HTDLC” approved by the Tribunal de Defensa de la Libre Competencia of Chile (hereinafter referred to as the “Procedure”); LATAM Airlines Group S.A. informs the beginning of the tender procedure regulated by the Procedure and further informs the following:
The closing date for filing proposals expires at 12:00 am of the 22th of September 2015.
The Notary where the instruments established by the Procedure will be executed is the Santiago’s Notary of Patricio Raby Benavente.
The following is the calendar of activities published by the Comitê de Facilitação de Voos (Flights Facilitating Committee) of the International Airport Sao Paulo- Guarulhos, Governor André Franco Montoro; for the following IATA season:
COMITÊ DE FACILITAÇÃO DE VOOS
Calendar of Activities
Activity
Summer Season 2016 (S16)
Statement of capacity 07/09/2015
SHL Deadline 14/09/2015
Agreed Historics Deadline 01/10/2015
Initial Submission Deadline 08/10/2015
SAL Deadline 29/10/2015
IATA Slot Conference 10/11/2015
Slot Return Deadline 15/01/2016
National Slots Conference 26/01/2016
Historics Baseline Date 31/01/2016
Start/End of Season S16 27/03/2016 a 29/10/2016
Additionally we inform that a PEI (special exchange procedure- regulated by Article 28 of the Procedure) may be initiated provided the following conditions are met: (i) that LATAM has not exchanged to the date four daily takeoff Slots or four daily landing Slots; and (ii) that no Tender is in process, according to the regulations established in the Procedure.
Source:- Latam Airlines
